channel.title: Networking on Modernization workshop
channel.description: Recent content in Networking on Modernization workshop

item.title: Implementing Enterprise Service Mesh on AWS EKS Using Solo.io's Gloo Platform
item.description: In this workshop, customers will deploy Gloo Platform on a single EKS cluster and a subset of its features including topics like API key authentication, zero trust security, traffic policies and the Gloo dashboard.

item.title: Integrating Check Point CloudGuard Network Security and AWS Gateway Load Balancer
Intro to AWS App Mesh
item.description: In this workshop, you will learn about the features and usage of AWS App Mesh.
